column1: laura m. eaton-cano| laura m. eaton-cano
column2: age 82 of lake station passed away friday
column6: indiana to the late russell and caroline (nee brumm) shupe. laura was a member of hobart moose lodge womens chapter 249. she enjoyed spending time with her children and grandchildren. she is survived by her son
column7: norman scott (patricia) eaton of valparaiso; daughter
column8: vicki (paul) shear of lake station; three grandchildren
column10: loryn eaton and sarah eaton; great- granddaughter rhiannon fahey; two sisters
column11: lilly and barb both of illinois; many other loving family members and friends. she was preceded in death by husband
column12: andrew l. cano. a funeral service for laura will be tuesday

column17: hobart. burial will follow at calvary cemetery
column20: 2015 from 2:00-8:00 p. m. at rees funeral home
